hero.title: BreastScan
hero.subtitle: AI-assisted image review to help clinicians with additional confirmation.

presentation.title: Empowering Clinical Judgment: A New Frontier in Breast Cancer Diagnostics
presentation.lead: Augmenting oncological expertise with secure, interpretable AI to foster a deeper narrative of care, from diagnosis to dialogue.
presentation.challenge_title: The Global Challenge, The Personal Impact
presentation.challenge_text: With breast cancer affecting 1 in 8 women in their lifetime, it represents one of modern medicine's most significant challenges. Behind every statistic is a unique individual, and for clinicians on the front lines, providing a timely, precise, and empathetic diagnosis is the critical first step in their journey. Our mission is to provide an additional layer of support for these crucial moments.
presentation.paradigm_title: A Paradigm of Support, Not Replacement
presentation.paradigm_text: We introduce an advanced classification model designed not to replace, but to enhance the discerning eye of the medical professional. By analyzing diagnostic data through a sophisticated algorithmic lens, our technology provides a powerful, quantitative source of information. It serves as a trusted partner in the diagnostic process, offering supplementary insights to strengthen clinical confidence and streamline the path to a conclusive assessment.
presentation.privacy_title: Data Integrity and Patient Privacy: An Unwavering Commitment
presentation.privacy_text: In an era of open AI, the sanctity of patient data is paramount. Publicly-available models often use submitted data for training, an unacceptable risk for sensitive medical information. Our system is different by design. It operates within a secure, proprietary, and closed-loop environment. Patient data is processed with the utmost confidentiality and is never used for external model training. We provide a powerful tool, not a data liability.
presentation.conversation_title: From Interpretation to Conversation: Enhancing Patient Comfort
presentation.conversation_text: A clear diagnosis is the foundation of patient trust. Our model generates interpretable results that empower clinicians to articulate their findings with greater clarity and depth. This facilitates a more comprehensive patient dialogue, helping to transform moments of uncertainty into a collaborative and understandable plan for treatment and prevention. By providing a clearer picture, we help foster the comfort and comprehension every patient deserves.
